Classes in org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.security.gss used by org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.job.impl
CredentialContext
          Provides a persistent context for GSS credentials.
 

Classes in org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.security.gss used by org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.security.gss
CredentialContext
          Provides a persistent context for GSS credentials.
CredentialException
          Describes a credential related exception.
CredentialManagerService
          Describes a service for creating and maintaining credential contexts, where a credential context maintains a handle to a GSS credential for a given user.
CredentialMapping
          Maps a credential to a resource location
CredentialMappingTaskType
           
CredentialRepository
          Describes a credential repository.
CredentialRepositoryType
          Describes a type of credential repository.
CredentialRetrievalContext
          Describes a retrieval context for a GSS credential.
CredentialRetrievalException
          Describes a credential retrieval related exception.
GssConnection
          Represents a connection to a gss secured resource.
GssConnectionResource
          Describes a service resource to which gss secured connections can be made.
GssConnectionResourceType
          Describes a type of gss service resource.
GssEnabledResource
          Describes a service resource to which gss secured connections can be made.
GssEnabledResourceType
          Describes a type of gss service resource.
HttpgServiceLocation
          Describes the location of a web sevice resource.
HttpgServiceResourceType
          Describes a type of httpg service resource.
